|flash1type = NAND |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Samsung;KLM4G1FEPD-B031;SEC 604 B031, KLM4G1FEPD (4GB eMMC NAND); |flash1size = 4 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
